task.title: Editing Board Title
task.shortdesc: This task allows you to change a board's title on monday.com. You would use this feature in order to change the title of a board if the focus of it changes or if it is re-purposed for something else.

context.p: Boards on monday.com are used to contain different projects. You can allow different people access to different boards so that only people who are on a project have access to the board. You want to give a name to the blank board because the name will help distinguish it from other boards. You want to make the board visible if you are ready to reveal the project and you want to make the board invisible if you don't want others to have access to it yet.

step.cmd: From the Board Page, click on the desired item to edit
A window from the right will appear, click on the title at the top to begin a name change
Click on the update tab to bring up a text box that allows users to write and post updates
Clicking on the Info tab will allow you to add notes, files, and Questions and Answers
Clicking on the Activity Log tab will allow you to view recent changes and activity within the board
